forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 86. West wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 60. Northwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun hangs high in Boston, casting a warm glow that suggests the promise of a perfect summer day. The gentle winds from the west carry a refreshing hint of coolness amid the warmth, brushing against the skin and lifting spirits. It’s a day where the air, while clear, seems to weave a tapestry of soft haze, lending an ethereal quality to the horizon and blurring the edges of the cityscape. As evening approaches, the clouds drift above, offering nothing more than a smattering of wispy white against the vibrant blue.

As the day transitions toward night, clear skies will invite you to savor the outdoors. With the temperature settling comfortably into the evening, now is the ideal time to enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps find a quiet spot in one of the city’s many parks to unwind. Light layers would be prudent, as the sweetness of warmth will linger, soon giving way to a cooler breeze that whispers of the night ahead. This is a moment to relish the simple joys—perhaps a quiet conversation over coffee at an outdoor café or watching the subtle dance of city lights reflect on the water.
